content.text:
# Zee Cine Award for Best Dialogue

The Zee Cine Award Best Dialogue is a technical award.
The winners are listed below:-
{| cellspacing="1" cellpadding="1" border="0" width="50%"
|- bgcolor="#d1e4fd"
! Year || Winner (s) || Film
|-
|2025
|Aditya Dhar, Aditya Suhas Jambhale & Monal Thakkar
|Article 370
|-
| 2019 || Sumit Aroraa || Stree
|-
|2018
|Nitesh Tiwari
|Bareilly Ki Barfi
|-
|2015
|Juhi Chaturvedi
|Piku
|-
| 2008 || Jaideep Sahni || Chak De India
|-bgcolor=#edf3fe
| 2007 || Rajkumar Hirani  || Lage Raho Munna Bhai
|-
| 2006 || ||
|-bgcolor=#edf3fe
| 2005 || Vishal Bhardwaj  || Maqbool
|-
| 2004 || Abbas Tyrewala  || Munnabhai M.B.B.S.
|-bgcolor=#edf3fe
|2003||Piyush Mishra, Ranjit KapoorRajkumar Santoshi|| The Legend of Bhagat Singh
|}
